Title: Hawk and Dove
Writer: Akiva Goldsman, Akiva Goldsman (developed by), Geoff Johns (developed by), Greg Berlanti (developed by), Marisha Mukerjee (executive story editor), Akiva Goldsman
Actors: Brenton Thwaites, Anna Diop, Teagan Croft, Lindsey Gort
Plot: A new threat is after Rachel as she and Dick arrive at the home of Hank Hall and Dawn Granger, where a complicated history resurfaces.
